name: What is Pikashow TV?
description: Pikashow is a live android TV application that offers you to stream divergent video content on your android device. Everybody loves to spend their leisure time watching their favorite movies and TV shows. But in this modern age, everyone has a mobile phone and wants to watch movies and other entertaining content on their devices. Pikashow APK is one of the premiers that proffers multiple languages, black and white themes, and much more without any obstacles. It is entirely free of cost and beneficial for its users because its movies and live sports are a world of entertainment with no disruption.

name: Streams Content of 40+ OTT Platforms
description: You don’t need to look elsewhere to find free movies, shows or documentaries that cater to your specific interests. Why? Pikashow streams content from 40+ OTT platforms in a bid to leave no stone unturned when it comes to grabbing eyeballs.

name: Features
description: Its remarkable features will surprise you. You will be shocked to know about some of the amazing and incredible things that make this app so popular among movie lovers. So, let’s start without wasting more time.
